Subjects: Katherine of Alexandria, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Katharine of Alexandria (version in short lines)

BLHar4196.First Lines: Sum tyme als me may understandin Alisander was wonand…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …thurgh biseking of saint katerinunto þat welth þat he wons in
BLHar4196.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Altenglische Legenden: Neue Folge.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 165-73.
